parameters.description: The version of the API to use
parameters.name: Anytype-Version

parameters.description: The ID of the space to which the list belongs; must be retrieved from ListSpaces endpoint
parameters.name: space_id

parameters.description: The ID of the list to retrieve views for; must be retrieved from SearchSpace endpoint with types: ['collection', 'set']
parameters.name: list_id

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit
